job_title: Warehouse Clerk / Clerk / 倉務文員 / 文員 (建材貿易運輸公司 - 油麻地貨物起卸區）
description:
The Hong Kong Warehouse Keeper is responsible for ensuring proper receiving of product and documentation thereof.  Ensures that all orders are properly prepared for shipment as required.  Accountable for all transfers, paperwork and system functions.  Responsible for maintaining the overall appearance and housekeeping of warehouse, and periodic maintenance of warehouse and office at the Hong Kong facility.
You must be motivated, organized, professional and timely.  The hours for this position are generally 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Monday through Friday, but will be dependent on the department and customers’ needs and ensuring that customer needs are fulfilled.Receive incoming material, process paperwork, inspection, disposition to stock/shipping

Notify Loomis QC of incoming shipment for immediate receipt to SAP
Pull stock for orders
Print/prepare shippers for daily orders
Package orders for delivery
Complete information required on shipping paperwork and place with the packaged order i.e. bill of lading, international invoices, shippers, security endorsements, etc.
Meet “On-time” delivery.
Bag and re-bag stock as needed.
Record all inventory movement on inventory cards, and logs, as necessary. (Shipments, receipts, samples, returns, transfers, reworks and MRB)
Complete all receiving documentation with appropriate information i.e.: date received, qty. received, scale used, sample used, sample weight and initials.
Complete any other documents necessary. i.e. Overage/Shortage, or rejection.
Ability to repetitively lift, move and process packages weighing up to 19 kg.

 JOB REQUIREMENTS


The hours for this position are generally 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Monday through Friday, but will be dependent on the department and customers’ needs and ensuring that customer needs are fulfilled.
Be motivated, organized, professional and timely.
Ability to repetitively lift, move and process packages weighing up to 19 kg.
Clear telephone and email communication skills. Must be able to speak English clearly and be able to be understood clearly over the telephone and email. Be fluent in Cantonese.
Typing skills and alpha/numeric data entry skills required.
One (1) year minimum warehouse experience.
One (1) year minimum of computer experience.
Customer Service or Sale Administration Officer experience preferred.

description:
WORK WITH US.

Pursue your passion for adventure and innovation at BOA.

LIFE AT BOA.

We are a team of innovators, disruptors, creators, and so much more. We know the importance of actively pursuing goals and the excitement of taking calculated risks to push what’s possible and create what’s next.

Does life as a pioneer at BOA sound like the place for you? If so, check out our open position below and submit your application today!

OVERVIEW OF THE ROLE

Reporting to the Warehouse Supervisor, you will be responsible for processing daily warehouse operations. You must ensure that the right orders to arrange for right packing and using EPR system to manage the items allocation for the company and ensure the warehouse operator to complete the inbound and pick & pack functions in warehouse without delay. You may also be involved in logistics interdepartmental projects, ensure the orders’ delivery / transportation to send and release to customers with on time manner.

CORE RESPONSIBILITIES

Regularly role model the Core Operating Principles to your team and others 
Coordinate with warehouse team to ensure In / Out orders processing on-time
Ensure the warehouse and material allocation accuracy
Prepare pick & pack documents for shipment within the schedule
Communicate with HK and USA internal customer
Prepare and record warehouse KPI data correctly
Other ad-hoc tasks as instructed by supervisor

 REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS

Post-secondary education (English & Chinese passed in HKCEE / HKDSE or equivalent)
Minimum 1 year of working experience
Good command of both verbal and written business English as well as fluency in Mandarin essential
Initiative, with positive mindset and willing to learn
Flexible, teamwork oriented and able to communicate with people at all levels
Immediate available is preferred
Working Hours: 2:00pm – 10:00pm

  DESIRED QUALIFICATIONS

Continually seeking improvement
Able to manage and release stress

BENEFITS

We’re committed to helping our people be themselves, be well, and grow. We’re proud to offer a creative work environment with a range of benefits no matter where you are around the world. 

Fun, friendly workplace with social adventures and activities
Health and Wellness program
Support for local communities
Learning and development opportunities
Competitive remuneration package
